title: IAssemblyDoc.ReorganizeComponents
description: Reorganizes an assembly's structure by moving the selected components to the selected assembly or sub-assembly.
signature:
System.Boolean ReorganizeComponents( 
   System.Object
Source
,
   System.Object
Target
)

parameters.name: Source
parameters.description: Array of selected components to more; all of the components must be at the same level in one parent assembly

parameters.name: Target
parameters.description: Where to move the components, which can be a top-level assembly or sub-assembly anywhere at any level of the hierarchy

returns: True if the selected components were moved to the selected assembly or sub-assembly, false if not
remarks: See SOLIDWORKS Help for more information about reorganizing components and restructuring assemblies.
